alert.note: Alert for Florence; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 12:33PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Florence and northwestern Williamsburg Counties through 130 PM EDT... At 1230 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a small cluster of strong thunderstorms straddling the county line near Hebron, or 10 miles west of Kingstree, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake City, Hebron, Cades, Friendfield, New Hope, Scranton, Coward, Olanta, Central Crossroads and Lake City Community Hospital. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
